metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5747 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Long Range Zip (aka lrzip) 0.631, there is a use-after-free in the ucompthread function (stream.c). Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial of service via a crafted lrz file.

criterions.comment: lrzip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
